'''''maidh''''' or '''''mai√∞''''' is a [[Noldorin]] word which means "pale", "fallow" or "fawn".

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[MAD]], meaning "pale", "fallow" or "fawn".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''MAD'''</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Maidhros]]'' = pale-glitter
